Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Technical Quiz

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College for Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Entry Fees : 100/- per participants.

Prizes :
Winner :₹3000
Runner Up: ₹2000

Coordinators :

  • 1) Sanket Thakare : 9119495966
  • 2) Aatif Khan : 9764433143
  • 3) Maithili Pande : 9665178804
  • 4) Nisha Pande : 9175238572
    Round 1: Basic Engineering Technical GK
  • 1) Number of questions - 50
  • 2) Time to solve - 20 mins
  • 3) Topics-Basic engineering, General science, etc
  • 4) No negative marking.
    Round 2: Image Identification
  • 1) Number of questions - 20
  • 2) Time to solve - 10 min
  • 3) Topic - General
    Round 3: Rapid Fire
  • 1) Time allotted - 90 sec per each
  • 2) Maximum question attempt
    Round 4: Quizzy Buzzers
  • 1) Questions will be announced verbally
  • 2) First come first serve.

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. A team must consist of a maximum of 4 and a minimum of 1 participant.
  • 2. Each team is allowed to present only one startup idea.
  • 3. Team members can be from the same or different fields and colleges.
  • 4. Internet facilities will not be provided during the event.
  • 5. No mentors will be provided by the organizing committee.
  • 6. Participants must report at 9 am on the event day.
  • 7. Participants are required to bring their own laptop or pen drive containing their presentations or any necessary hard copies.
  • 8. ID cards are compulsory for all participants irrespective of their college.
  • 9. Pitching will be conducted individually in front of the judges
